margin-header: Version 8.3.2 - What's New?
---

# Trip Generation

Several changes were made in the trip generation scripts:

- Added factors to reduce special generation attractiveness to Temple Square, SLC Library, and many colleges.
- Added Large District calibration factors.
- Adjusted short-haul truck light/medium/heavy trip production rates.
- Updated county-level adjustments to short-haul truck medium/heavy productions and attractions.
- Truck speed factors are now applied to all facility types, previously they applied only to freeway.
